HomePage.hero_desc: Automate your requests for quotes in an instant!

AdditionalInfoSection.title: We have gathered a wide range of product data from several domestic suppliers
AdditionalInfoSection.paragraphMiddle: and check if the product information you are looking for is already available. If something is missing, don't hesitate to contact us – we're just a

DemoSection.section_1_paragraph: Find the right products quickly and effortlessly. With our tool, you can browse supplier product catalogs, use filters, and add products directly to a request for quotation – simple and efficient!
DemoSection.section_2_paragraph: Customize your quotation to perfection. In the 'Create Quotation' view, you can save your and your customer's details easily across multiple templates. Products selected in the previous step are automatically included, and you can edit them line by line.
DemoSection.section_3_paragraph: The final touch with just one click! The 'Generate Quotation' button combines your selected products and the active template into a ready-to-use Excel file. You can finalize it yourself and export it as a PDF for your customer.
